featured.text: Though often associated with beauty, most dimples are actually a genetic 33 caused by shortened facial muscles.

other.text: As is often observed, most of us tend to associate lower notes with darker colors and higher notes with brighter colors.

definition.zh_def: 聯繫，將某事物與另一事物相連或關聯。
definition.en_def: To connect or link something with another thing.
definition.example: I always associate the smell of cookies with my grandmother's house.
